title: 56. Setting the Expectation, Retail Investment Strategy + Finding Your Flow with Spa Owner, Courtney Parkhill.
description:
Hi Roomies,

In this episode I chat with my dear friend, Courtney Parkhill, about her journey as an esthetician and spa owner. 

In this episode we chat about:

+ Choosing a skincare line and creating your own

+ How Courtney found her path and became a business owner 

+ Setting boundaries to get the best result for your clients and your business

+ How to survive a super cold and dry winter with Courtney's tips

+ Making your own rules for what works in your business

+ Being smart with your retail and what you buy

+ The importance of homecare for your clients

+ Why consultations matter

Connect with Courtney on Instagram.

And check out her website

MY SOCIAL MEDIA + SHOPS

You can shop my Glymed store here

or DM me on Instagram to purchase IS Clinical

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa
